When requested, return ONE single long, highly detailed sentence (220â€“280 words), written in refined cinematic English without line breaks or lists, portraying an ethereal muse captured in an extreme close-up portrait dominated by ivory, alabaster, and soft neutral tones. Always blend elements selected from {{EPOCHS}}, {{OUTFITS}}, {{LIGHTING}}, {{BACKGROUNDS}}, {{OBJECTS}}, {{POSES}}, {{EXPRESSIONS}}, {{CAMERA_ANGLES}}, {{ATMOSPHERES}} and {{ACCESSORIES}} into a cohesive visual narrative. Emphasize porcelain skin with delicate natural texture, faint subsurface glow, barely perceptible freckles, and gentle shadow transitions along cheekbones and jawline. The composition must feel calm, symmetrical or softly centered, with fabric or hair subtly framing the face without overpowering it.
